text: The Bay City Rollers are a Scottish pop rock in the 1970s. They were called the "teen sensations from Edinburgh". The group's line-up had many changes over the years, but the classic line-up were guitarists Eric Faulkner and Stuart Wood, singer Les McKeown, bassist Alan Longmuir, and drummer Derek Longmuir. ==References== Category:British boy bands Category:Scottish musical groups
title: Bay City Rollers
